name: tubby
description: youtube channel instant search, and related tooling
author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts build-styles && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean -s && run-p build-scripts-debug build-styles && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.build-scripts: tsc && browserify source/tubby.global.tsx -p [ tsify ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify > dist/tubby.global.bundle.unoptimized.js && uglifyjs -cm < dist/tubby.global.bundle.unoptimized.js > dist/tubby.global.bundle.js
